scan_linter_check.description: getXMLAnswer only retrieves the Answer which we are actually after. getXML retrieves the whole XML document. In most cases, we are not interested in the whole XML document, though only in the Answer. For the rare cases where you are interested in the whole XML document, simply mute the generated scan finding.
scan_linter_check.name: Consider using getXMLAnswer instead of getXML
scan_linter_check.resolution_details: Replace the usage of getXML by getXMLAnswer.
